short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Polish your slack or gmail messages seamlessly with ChatGPT

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension can replace Grammarly once and for all. You'll never need to worry about sending messages with bad grammar or sounding unprofessional again. Let ChatGPT polish your messages to perfection.
It currently functions with Slack and Gmail, and we are actively working on integrating it with other websites as well.
